text.text: Here's a brief glimpse into my data journey. Click on the arrows/swipe to begin

text.headline: Introduction to Machine Learning
text.text: Came across the world of Data, AI and ML for the first time at BITS Pilani. Started down a rabbit hole that I'm yet to come out of

text.headline: Interned at Reflexis Systems
text.text: Interned at Reflexis Systems, where I worked on prototyping multiple machine learning models in the retail workforce space

text.headline: Graduated from BITS Pilani
text.text: Graduated with a BE in Electronics & Communications Engineering, all the while taking quite a number of CS courses over the semesters

text.headline: Joined HSBC
text.text: Landed my first full-time job at HSBC, joining as part of their Global Graduate Program

text.headline: Foray into ML Software Engineering
text.text: Started working as a ML SWE, where I was responsible for building and deploying ML models that would help the bank reduce their incidents, outages and change risk

text.headline: Foray into Data Science
text.text: Evolution of my role into more of a Data Scientist, where I was responsible for not only driving business critical analytics for executive level strategic decisions, but also transformation of data processes

text.headline: Admission into Georgia Tech
text.text: Joined Georgia Tech's flagship OMSCS program, specializing in Interactive Intelligence

text.headline: A Packed Year & becoming a Senior
text.text: An empty timeline year, but packed to the brim with OMSCS and working in a new senior data role

text.headline: Got PowerBI Certified
text.text: Received my Microsoft's PowerBI Data Analyst Associate Certification
